survey_name: Digital Privacy Concerns and Practices Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the level of concern and current practices related to digital privacy among internet users.

questions.question_text: How concerned are you about your digital privacy when using online services?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is visually appealing on mobile devices.

script.question_text: How concerned are you about your digital privacy when using online services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following actions do you take to protect your digital privacy? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Regularly review privacy settings on apps/websites
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Ensure checkboxes are easy to tap on mobile screens.

script.question_text: Which of the following actions do you take to protect your digital privacy? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Regularly review privacy settings on apps/websites

questions.question_text: How often do you review the privacy policies of apps or websites before using them?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale. Ensure the question is clear and concise.

script.question_text: How often do you review the privacy policies of apps or websites before using them?

questions.question_text: Have you ever stopped using a service due to privacy concerns?

script.question_text: Have you ever stopped using a service due to privacy concerns?

questions.question_text: If yes, which type of service did you stop using? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Show only if Q4 is 'Yes'. Allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: If yes, which type of service did you stop using? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes your trust level in companies to protect your personal data?
questions.client_notes: Use a trust scale. Ensure readability.

script.question_text: Which of the following best describes your trust level in companies to protect your personal data?

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with data privacy laws (e.g., GDPR, CCPA)?
questions.client_notes: Use a familiarity scale. Keep options clear.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with data privacy laws (e.g., GDPR, CCPA)?

questions.question_text: Do you use any privacy-focused tools or apps (e.g., encrypted messaging, ad blockers)?
questions.client_notes: Include a 'Not sure' option for accuracy.

script.question_text: Do you use any privacy-focused tools or apps (e.g., encrypted messaging, ad blockers)?

questions.question_text: If yes, please specify which privacy-focused tools or apps you use.
questions.client_notes: Show only if Q8 is 'Yes'. Allow free-text input.

script.question_text: If yes, please specify which privacy-focused tools or apps you use.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to pay for a service that offers enhanced privacy features?
questions.client_notes: Use a likelihood scale. Ensure options are balanced.

script.question_text: How likely are you to pay for a service that offers enhanced privacy features?

questions.question_text: What is your biggest concern regarding digital privacy?
questions.client_notes: Allow free-text input to capture diverse concerns.

script.question_text: What is your biggest concern regarding digital privacy?
